Class Exceptions

  • public abstract class Exceptions
extends Object
    Utility class for exceptions.

    • Method Detail

      • extractCause

        public static <T extends Throwable> T extractCause(Throwable t,
                                                   ClassLoader classLoader,
                                                   Class<? extends T> expectedCauseType)
        Tries to extract the expected cause from the commit exception and returns with it. May return with null if the expected exception cannot be extracted from the wrapper commit exception.
        Parameters:
        t - the throwable possible wrapping the original cause of a failure commit.
        classLoader - class loader for resolving the excepted cause. May be null.
        expectedCauseType - the expected case type.
        Returns:
        the wrapped cause or null if cannot be extracted.
